Package com.backend.Services.Services

Class RestaurantFoodService

java.lang.Object
com.backend.Services.Services.RestaurantFoodService
@Service public class RestaurantFoodService extends Object
Service that manipulates data regarding the food related information from the database

      Parameters:
      restaurant - the restaurant that is querried
      Returns:
      a list of food that belongs to the restaurant
      Throws:
